nodes.text: Bill lets public use lethal force on intruders | Irish Examiner  Finally some common sense is coming to Ireland. Now the criminals are going to be behind the 8 ball rather than the homeowners. The Irish will soon have the ability to beat a home invader into unconsciousness with a bat, hunk of pipe or any other implement, if they catch them in the process of stealing their TV. And the burglar won't be able to do a damn thing about it. That's how civilized society is supposed to work. The Castle Doctrine is spreading out from America to other nations, and it's about damn time.
You think someone deserves to be beaten into unconsciousness with a bat for trying to steal a TV?
'Even the sight of guns, which people think of as objects that can hurt others, can induce aggressive ideas.' -Leonard Berkowitz
So you see a cop on the streets, you see he's armed, that's enough to induce aggression and violence, possibly cause you to hurt others, simply because you saw that somebody else was armed?
